```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)

```

## Read in data

```{r}
# read precipitation data
precipt <- read.csv("../daniela/M5025_PrecipitaciÃ³n_subhorario-validado.csv")
WL <- read.csv("../daniela/WL_data.csv")
# rename columns
colnames(precipt)[1] = "DateTime"
colnames(precipt)[2] = "Precipitation"

```

## Scatterplot
```{r scatterplot}
## plot 
ggplot(precipt, 
       aes(x = DateTime, y = Precipitation)) + 
  geom_point() +
  xlab("Date") +
  theme_minimal()

```

## Join data
```{r join}
WL_precip <- merge(precipt,
                   WL,
                   by = "DateTime")
```
